title: Process an Annuity Withdrawal
description: An annuity holder requests a partial withdrawal from their contract.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and the amount they wish to withdraw.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the customer and confirms the withdrawal amount.

tasks.description: Determine if any surrender charges or tax penalties apply.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the withdrawal is within the penalty-free amount.

tasks.description: Process the withdrawal and mail the check to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the withdrawal and issues the payment.
